<script>
  (function () {
    const root = document.getElementById('fig-concept');
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('fig_lang_concept');
    if (saved === 'en' || saved === 'ml') root.setAttribute('data-lang', saved);

    function syncButtons(lang) {
      document.querySelectorAll('#fig-concept .lang-btn').forEach(b => {
        const on = b.getAttribute('data-set-lang') === lang;
        b.classList.toggle('active', on);
        b.setAttribute('aria-selected', on ? 'true' : 'false');
      });
    }
    syncButtons(root.getAttribute('data-lang'));

    document.querySelectorAll('#fig-concept .lang-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const lang = btn.getAttribute('data-set-lang');
        root.setAttribute('data-lang', lang);
        localStorage.setItem('fig_lang_concept', lang);
        syncButtons(lang);
      });
    });
  })();
</script>
